entities.name: victor
entities.description: Viktor is mentioned as storming away from Luna's father, indicating a conflict or argument.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna's father is involved in an argument with Viktor, suggesting that Luna is also present at the scene.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is asked by someone if he is okay, indicating his presence and potential involvement in the situation.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt's voice is heard as a Patronus, announcing the fall of the Ministry and Scrimgeour's death.

relationships.description: Viktor and Luna's father were arguing, as indicated by Viktor storming away from the scene.
Someone asked Harry if he was okay, indicating a concern for his well-being.
Kingsley Shacklebolt's Patronus announced the fall of the Ministry and Scrimgeour's death.
